high_descs: Walk over to the microwave straight ahead in the kitchen.
Open the door of the microwave, and pick up the yellow mango inside of the microwave, then close the door.
Turn around, walk over to the small black coffee table that is next to the kitchen table.
Place the yellow mango on the small black coffee table.
anns.task_desc: Take a Mango out of the microwave to put on the CoffeeTable.

high_descs: Fruit is carried near the coffeetable.
Mango is kept in the coffeetable.
anns.task_desc: To take the Mango from the CoffeeTable

high_descs: Turn around, go straight, and turn left to reach the microwave on the kitchen table.
Pick up the mango from the oven.
turn around go straight and turn left to reach coffeetable
Keep the mango on the coffeetable.
anns.task_desc: Keep the Mango on the CoffeeTable.
